name: Cthulhu's Concise Dictionary of the R'lyehian Language
name_original: Cthulhu's Concise Dictionary of the R'lyehian Language
description:
Cthulhu's Concise Dictionary of the R'lyehian Language is a puzzle game developed by Ford Prefect. It was originally released in 2021.
You can play Cthulhu's Concise Dictionary of the R'lyehian Language on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
